summary: craftable in ebony  - no perk required UNP
descriptionHtml:
Mod was converted for UNP body
craftable in ebony  - no perk required. Requires iron ingots. (or use console)
Item names begins from ExtWitch so help "ExtWitch" to get ItemID if you decide to use console
Mod requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213]HDT high heels system[/url]
Has items (for more info look screens):
dress, stockings: red, redinverse, black, blackinverse, blue, blueinverse, green, greeninverse, purp, purpinverse
skirt, boots, gloves: red, redbright, black, grey, blue, bluebright, green, greenbright, purp, purpbright
laces: gothickblack, gothicred, gothicbue, gothicgreen, gothicpurp, flowerblack, flowerred, flowerblue, flowergreen, flowerpurp.
Dress, boots, gloves use usual slots. Stockings use slot 53 and 54, laces slot 53, skirts slot 52.
CBBE version is [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84447]here[/url]

You can make anything what you want while it is non-commercial destribution and you give me credits as original mod author.
I don't give permission to upload it in steam.


F.A.Q.

Q: Can I convert it to other body and/or retexture and/or change armor type
and/or make replacer from it  and upload it here?
A: You are welcome, just give me credits as original mod author.

Q:Do you plan to convert it to other body?
A: For UNP conversion is done.About other bodies - not sure yet. I would be glad if someone else want to make this work.

Q: Why it is heavy armor??? It is obviously robe!!
A: If you want to change it - read first question. If it is just a question - because I find heavy armor most useful.

PS. Yes, I decided to make separate page for UNP version (if you downloaded UNP version  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84447]here[/url] before you don't need to download this file).

Bodyslide conversion by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3825210]MightionNY[/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84612]here[/url]

-------------Credits-------------------
for damask pattern to yagellonica  http://yagellonica.deviantart.com/
for lace brushes to Myruso http://myruso.deviantart.com/ and to clowx http://clowx.deviantart.com/
for Bodyslide conversion to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3825210]MightionNY[/url]
for some screens to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/12993320]XDuplexX[/url]
author: newmiller
